WorkItem.Description: I use Chart (D3 library for Silverlight) to draw a graph and I want to change some properties of X axis (for example, Range). In documentation the Axis class is described in details. But how can I set Range of the Chart axis in XAML (or in code-behind)? Is it real?
WorkItem.Summary: How can I change properties of Chart axis in Dynamic Data Display (D3) for Silverlight?
